title: A strange wind whispers secrets on
description: A strange wind whispers secrets on the Chippewa Trail Connector. I sense a yearning there, a desire for something light to take flight. Your task is simple, yet profound: you must throw a paper airplane at the Chippewa Trail Connector. Let its brief, silent journey carry a message to the unseen, for only then will the path ahead reveal itself.

trailLocation.title: Chippewa Trail Connector
trailLocation.description: A walking trail offering outdoor recreation opportunities. Features concrete surface.
